trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter to convert <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> classes to and from various other representations.
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This converter can only convert an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> object to and from a string.
For more information about type converters, see the TypeConverter base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
> [!NOTE] > You should never create an instance of ActivityBindTypeConverter.
Instead, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter"></xref> class.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object of the given source type to an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> using the specified context.
CanConvertFrom returns `true` if `sourceType` is a string.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to convert.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value indicating whether this converter can convert an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to the destination type using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check.
Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
> [!NOTE] > Override this method to provide your own conversion requirements.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type to convert the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts the specified object to an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>, using the specified context and culture information.
This converter can only convert an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> object to and from a string.
`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check.
Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
An optional <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
If not supplied, the current culture is assumed.
The <xref:System.Object> to convert.
The <xref:System.Object> that represents the converted value.
An error occurred while converting valueToConvert to an .
Converts the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> object to the specified type using the specified context and culture.
ConvertTo converts an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> to a string.
`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from.
This can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check.
Also, properties on the `context` object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> into which the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> will be converted.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to convert.
The <xref:System.Type> to convert the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> to.
The converted object.
Returns a collection of properties for the type of array specified by the value parameter using the specified context and attributes.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
An <xref:System.Object> that specifies the type of array for which to get properties.
An <xref:System.Attribute> array that is used as a filter.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> with the properties that are exposed for this data type, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if there are no properties.
Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> supports properties using the specified context.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetProperties*> should be called to find the properties of this object; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a collection of standard values for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> data type using the specified context.
`context` can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
`context` or any property available through it can be a null reference (`Nothing`).
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> that holds a standard set of valid values or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

Returns whether the collection of standard values returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exclusive list of possible values, using the specified context.
If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid.

If the list is not exclusive, then other valid values might exist in addition to the list of standard values that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method provides.
If the values are exclusive, the list returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> should not allow these values to be edited.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> is an exhaustive list of possible values; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if other values are possible.
Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked.
This parameter can be a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), so always check it.
Also, properties on the context object can return a null reference (`Nothing`).
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityBindTypeConverter.GetStandardValues*> should be called to find a common set of values the object supports; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
